ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR(ISPICKVAL(Shipment_Status__c, "Cleared but Awaiting Vessel"), ISPICKVAL(Shipment_Status__c, "Delivered"), ISPICKVAL(Shipment_Status__c, "Cleared but Stopped"), ISPICKVAL(Shipment_Status__c, "Delivered to Depot"), ISPICKVAL(Shipment_Status__c, "Agent Notified"), ISPICKVAL(Shipment_Status__c, "ETA -15") , ISPICKVAL(Shipment_Status__c, "ETA -10"), ISPICKVAL(Shipment_Status__c, "ETA -7"), ISPICKVAL(Shipment_Status__c, "ETA -4"), ISPICKVAL(Shipment_Status__c, "In Progress"), ISPICKVAL(Shipment_Status__c , "TLX Confirmation"), ISPICKVAL(Shipment_Status__c , "Delivery On route")) ,(ISPICKVAL(Freight_Mode__c, "Sea")), MBL_Number__c = "")
